game.name: Subway Surf Halloween
game.description:
All the streets of your city are full of deadly zombies at your favorite Halloween night. The character of this brand new adventure challenge can only survive if he runs continuously. Apart from this, there are plenty of other obstacles that will try to restrict him from running forward. Join Subway Surf Halloween game and get ready to control the character who is also your good friend! Now it is up to you how help him keep running in the adventures of Zombie town. 
In the popular Halloween edition of Subway Surf, you have to guide the character run and jump over different kinds of obstacles. Use the arrow keys to get him through the subways, bridges and other hindrances of the game! Do not forget to grab as many coins, special powers and precious gems as possible to cover the maximum possible distance and set a new high score! The coins you collect throughout the gameplay will also help to unlock new cool characters in this free online runner game. 
Remember the more candies you grab on your way, the better score you will create in the end. Be alert and try to jump at the right time when you meet an evil zombie or a midnight ghost bus! You can avoid some obstacles by rolling under them or jumping over them in this Halloween endless running game. Also keep your eyes on the holes in the ground or avoid the cars and zombies on the road. Collect all the candies lying around to improve your points! Do not forget to collect some power ups in this endless zombie game!
